messages.subject: re: living an unschooled life
messages.msgSnippet: I just got this really good idea, after reading a post on shinewithunschooling and thought I would share here.  Someone over there was just sharing a day in
messages.messageBody:
I just got this really good idea, after reading a post on
shinewithunschooling and thought I would share here. Someone over
there was just sharing a "day in their unschooly life" and I thought
it would be fun to keep a file of those stories, and maybe, just maybe
eventually turn it into some kind of a book. I love reading those
stories, as I am sure most of you do too so share your stories, either
here or e-mail me off list and I will keep them in a file. They are
very inspirational and remind us all of why we choose to live this
lifestyle.

Heidi
